verses.verse: Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> to his anointed, <WH4899> to Cyrus, <WH3566> whose <WH834> right hand <WH3225> I have holden, <WH2388> to subdue <WH7286> nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> him; and I will loose <WH6605> the loins <WH4975> of kings, <WH4428> to open <WH6605> before <WH6440> him the two leaved gates; <WH1817> and the gates <WH8179> shall not <WH3808> be shut; <WH5462>

I <WH589> will go <WH1980> before <WH6440> thee, and make the crooked places straight: <WH3474> <WH1921> I will break in pieces <WH7665> the gates <WH1817> of brass, <WH5154> and cut in sunder <WH1438> the bars <WH1280> of iron: <WH1270>

And I will give <WH5414> thee the treasures <WH214> of darkness, <WH2822> and hidden riches <WH4301> of secret places, <WH4565> that <WH4616> thou mayest know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I, <WH589> the LORD, <WH3068> which call <WH7121> thee by thy name, <WH8034> am the God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>

For Jacob <WH3290> my servant's sake, <WH4616> <WH5650> and Israel <WH3478> mine elect, <WH972> I have even called <WH7121> thee by thy name: <WH8034> I have surnamed <WH3655> thee, though thou hast not <WH3808> known <WH3045> me.
I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> and there is none <WH369> else, <WH5750> there is no <WH369> God <WH430> beside <WH2108> me: I girded <WH247> thee, though thou hast not <WH3808> known <WH3045> me:

That <WH4616> they may know <WH3045> from the rising <WH4480> <WH4217> of the sun, <WH8121> and from the west, <WH4480> <WH4628> that <WH3588> there is none <WH657> beside <WH1107> me. I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> and there is none <WH369> else. <WH5750>

I form <WH3335> the light, <WH216> and create <WH1254> darkness: <WH2822> I make <WH6213> peace, <WH7965> and create <WH1254> evil: <WH7451> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> do <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things.

Drop down, <WH7491> ye heavens, <WH8064> from above, <WH4480> <WH4605> and let the skies <WH7834> pour down <WH5140> righteousness: <WH6664> let the earth <WH776> open, <WH6605> and let them bring forth <WH6509> salvation, <WH3468> and let righteousness <WH6666> spring up <WH6779> together; <WH3162> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have created <WH1254> it.

Woe <WH1945> unto him that striveth <WH7378> with <WH854> his Maker! <WH3335> Let the potsherd <WH2789> strive with <WH854> the potsherds <WH2789> of the earth. <WH127> Shall the clay <WH2563> say <WH559> to him that fashioneth <WH3335> it, What <WH4100> makest <WH6213> thou? or thy work, <WH6467> He hath no <WH369> hands? <WH3027>
Woe <WH1945> unto him that saith <WH559> unto his father, <WH1> What <WH4100> begettest <WH3205> thou? or to the woman, <WH802> What <WH4100> hast thou brought forth? <WH2342>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel, <WH3478> and his Maker, <WH3335> Ask <WH7592> me of things to come <WH857> concerning <WH5921> my sons, <WH1121> and concerning <WH5921> the work <WH6467> of my hands <WH3027> command <WH6680> ye me.

I <WH595> have made <WH6213> the earth, <WH776> and created <WH1254> man <WH120> upon <WH5921> it: I, <WH589> even my hands, <WH3027> have stretched out <WH5186> the heavens, <WH8064> and all <WH3605> their host <WH6635> have I commanded. <WH6680>

I <WH595> have raised him up <WH5782> in righteousness, <WH6664> and I will direct <WH3474> all <WH3605> his ways: <WH1870> he <WH1931> shall build <WH1129> my city, <WH5892> and he shall let go <WH7971> my captives, <WH1546> not <WH3808> for price <WH4242> nor <WH3808> reward, <WH7810> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> The labor <WH3018> of Egypt, <WH4714> and merchandise <WH5505> of Ethiopia <WH3568> and of the Sabeans, <WH5436> men <WH376> of stature, <WH4060> shall come over <WH5674> unto <WH5921> thee, and they shall be <WH1961> thine: they shall come <WH1980> after <WH310> thee; in chains <WH2131> they shall come over, <WH5674> and they shall fall down <WH7812> unto <WH413> thee, they shall make supplication <WH6419> unto <WH413> thee, saying, Surely <WH389> God <WH410> is in thee; and there is none <WH369> else, <WH5750> there is no <WH657> God. <WH430>
Verily <WH403> thou <WH859> art a God <WH410> that hidest thyself, <WH5641> O God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> the Savior. <WH3467>
They shall be ashamed, <WH954> and also <WH1571> confounded, <WH3637> all <WH3605> of them: they shall go <WH1980> to confusion <WH3639> together <WH3162> that are makers <WH2796> of idols. <WH6736>

But Israel <WH3478> shall be saved <WH3467> in the LORD <WH3068> with an everlasting <WH5769> salvation: <WH8668> ye shall not <WH3808> be ashamed <WH954> nor <WH3808> confounded <WH3637> world without end. <WH5704> <WH5769> <WH5703>

For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> that created <WH1254> the heavens; <WH8064> God <WH430> himself <WH1931> that formed <WH3335> the earth <WH776> and made <WH6213> it; he <WH1931> hath established <WH3559> it, he created <WH1254> it not <WH3808> in vain, <WH8414> he formed <WH3335> it to be inhabited: <WH3427> I <WH589> am the LORD; <WH3068> and there is none <WH369> else. <WH5750>

I have not <WH3808> spoken <WH1696> in secret, <WH5643> in a dark <WH2822> place <WH4725> of the earth: <WH776> I said <WH559> not <WH3808> unto the seed <WH2233> of Jacob, <WH3290> Seek <WH1245> ye me in vain: <WH8414> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> speak <WH1696> righteousness, <WH6664> I declare <WH5046> things that are right. <WH4339>

Assemble yourselves <WH6908> and come; <WH935> draw near <WH5066> together, <WH3162> ye that are escaped <WH6412> of the nations: <WH1471> they have no knowledge <WH3045> <WH3808> that set up <WH5375> <WH853> the wood <WH6086> of their graven image, <WH6459> and pray <WH6419> unto <WH413> a god <WH410> that cannot <WH3808> save. <WH3467>

Tell <WH5046> ye, and bring them near; <WH5066> yea, <WH637> let them take counsel <WH3289> together: <WH3162> who <WH4310> hath declared <WH8085> this <WH2063> from ancient time? <WH4480> <WH6924> who hath told <WH5046> it from that time? <WH4480> <WH227> have not <WH3808> I <WH589> the LORD? <WH3068> and there is no <WH369> God <WH430> else <WH5750> beside <WH4480> <WH1107> me; a just <WH6662> God <WH410> and a Savior; <WH3467> there is none <WH369> beside <WH2108> me.
Look <WH6437> unto <WH413> me, and be ye saved, <WH3467> all <WH3605> the ends <WH657> of the earth: <WH776> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am God, <WH410> and there is none <WH369> else. <WH5750>

I have sworn <WH7650> by myself, the word <WH1697> is gone out <WH3318> of my mouth <WH4480> <WH6310> in righteousness, <WH6666> and shall not <WH3808> return, <WH7725> That <WH3588> unto me every <WH3605> knee <WH1290> shall bow, <WH3766> every <WH3605> tongue <WH3956> shall swear. <WH7650>

Surely, <WH389> shall one say, <WH559> in the LORD <WH3068> have I righteousness <WH6666> and strength: <WH5797> even to <WH5704> him shall men come; <WH935> and all <WH3605> that are incensed <WH2734> against him shall be ashamed. <WH954>
In the LORD <WH3068> shall all <WH3605> the seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> be justified, <WH6663> and shall glory. <WH1984>
